medical_history.chief_complaint: Bradycardia and ectopic atrial rhythm on ECG.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of hypertension, hyperlipidemia, recurrent multiple colonic adenomatous polyps, multiple subcutaneous lipomas, seborrheic keratoses, atrophic left kidney from retroperitoneal fibrosis, and left Bell palsy.
medical_history.family_history: Family history of colon polyps in brother and a benign cecal mass in son.
